name: Teleportank
description:
( Please do not play web version in full screen as resolution may get messed up )

Made for GBJam 9

Controls:

- Arrow keys/WASD/ZQSD to move

- Hold X/L to shoot

- C/K to teleport to your target reticle

- P to toggle gameboy effects

- Enter to start

( NOTE : If you're rating for GBjam, then maybe try the game with gameboy affects turned on )
